author: Michboater

review: I have both a Chromecast and Fire TV stick, and I honestly prefer my Chromecast over the Fire Stick.  Chromecast has a much more intuitive and integrated user interface, which allows me to launch from in the apps themselves and not Amazon's Fire TV app.  I don't care for the Fire TV app, it is clunky and hard to use (do I swipe left to right or right to left to make the selection move right???).  The little track pad in the Fire TV app would be much better as a D-Pad instead.  Then I could just arrow up and down, left and right as many "clicks" as I want.  I guess, let me pick if I want the touchpad or the d-pad.  Give me the d-pad option and I'd rate it 4.5 stars.One big advantage of the Fire Stick over Chromecast: Prime Instant Video (90% of the reason I got the Fire Stick).Both work great, just wish Amazon didn't force me to use their app to watch videos or do anything else.
